verses.verse: וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu dwelt שָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> sa-rei- And the rulers הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; at Jerusalem וּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> u-she-'Ar the rest הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> Ha-'om of the people הִפִּ֨ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> hip-Pi-lu also cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Lot lots לְהָבִ֣יא׀ <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi to bring אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הָעֲשָׂרָ֗ה <S%H6235><s%> ha-'a-sa-Rah, of ten לָשֶׁ֙בֶת֙ <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet to dwell בִּֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim in Jerusalem עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh, the holy וְתֵ֥שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> ve-Te-sha' and nine הַיָּד֖וֹת <S%H3027><s%> hai-ya-Dot parts בֶּעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rim. [to dwell] in [other] cities

וַֽיְבָרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> vay-va-ra-Chu blessed הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; And the people לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men הַמִּֽתְנַדְּבִ֔ים <S%H5068><s%> ham-mit-nad-de-Vim, that willingly offered לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet themselves to dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. at Jerusalem פ Peh

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei Now these [are] the chief הַמְּדִינָ֔ה <S%H4082><s%> ham-me-di-Nah, of the province אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu that dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וּבְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> u-ve-'a-Rei but in the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah יָֽשְׁב֞וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu dwelt אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one בַּאֲחֻזָּתוֹ֙ <S%H272><s%> ba-'a-chuz-za-To in his possession בְּעָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> be-'A-rei-Hem, in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El [to wit] Israel הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim and the Levites וְהַנְּתִינִ֔ים <S%H5411><s%> ve-han-ne-ti-Nim, and the Nethinims וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei servants שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh. of Solomon's

וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim And at Jerusalem יָֽשְׁב֔וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu, dwelt מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei [certain] of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-be-Nei and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min; of Benjamin מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Of the children יְ֠הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> Ye-hu-dah of Judah עֲתָיָ֨ה <S%H6265><s%> 'a-ta-Yah Athaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עֻזִּיָּ֜ה <S%H5818><s%> 'uz-zi-Yah of Uzziah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זְכַרְיָ֧ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah of Zechariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲמַרְיָ֛ה <S%H568><s%> 'a-mar-Yah of Amariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁפַטְיָ֥ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah of Shephatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son מַהֲלַלְאֵ֖ל <S%H4111><s%> ma-ha-lal-'El of Mahalaleel מִבְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-nei- of the children פָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H6557><s%> Fa-retz. of Perez

וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֣ה <S%H4641><s%> u-ma-'a-se-Yah And Maaseiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> ba-Ruch of Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son כָּל־ kol- חֹ֠זֶה <S%H3626><s%> Cho-zeh of Colhozeh בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֲזָיָ֨ה <S%H2382><s%> cha-za-Yah of Hazaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עֲדָיָ֧ה <S%H5718><s%> 'a-da-Yah of Adaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יוֹיָרִ֛יב <S%H3114><s%> yo-ya-Riv of Joiarib בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah of Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַשִּׁלֹנִֽי׃ <S%H8023><s%> hash-shi-lo-Ni of Shiloni

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- All the sons פֶ֕רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Fe-retz of Perez הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim that dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; at Jerusalem אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' [were] four מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim threescore וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah and eight אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> 'an-shei- men חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil. valiant ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And these [are] the sons בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min; of Benjamin סַלֻּ֡א <S%H5543><s%> sal-Lu Sallu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֡ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹעֵ֡ד <S%H3133><s%> yo-'Ed of Joed בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פְּדָיָה֩ <S%H6305><s%> pe-da-Yah of Pedaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son ק֨וֹלָיָ֧ה <S%H6964><s%> ko-la-Yah of Kolaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son מַעֲשֵׂיָ֛ה <S%H4641><s%> ma-'a-se-Yah of Maaseiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אִֽיתִיאֵ֖ל <S%H384><s%> 'i-ti-'El of Ithiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְשַֽׁעְיָֽה׃ <S%H3470><s%> ye-Sha'-Yah. of Jesaiah

וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav And after גַּבַּ֣י <S%H1373><s%> gab-Bai him Gabbai סַלָּ֑י <S%H5543><s%> sal-Lai; Sallai תְּשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> te-Sha' nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight

וְיוֹאֵ֥ל <S%H3100><s%> ve-yo-'El And Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> zich-Ri of Zichri פָּקִ֣יד <S%H6496><s%> pa-Kid [was] their overseer עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; command וִיהוּדָ֧ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah and Judah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son הַסְּנוּאָ֛ה <S%H5574><s%> has-se-nu-'Ah of Senuah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- command הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir over the city מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <S%H4932><s%> mish-Neh. [was] second פ Peh

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim; Of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H3048><s%> ye-da'-Yah Jedaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יוֹיָרִ֖יב <S%H3114><s%> yo-ya-Riv of Joiarib יָכִֽין׃ <S%H3199><s%> ya-Chin. Jachin

שְׂרָיָ֨ה <S%H8304><s%> se-ra-Yah Seraiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Yah of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צָד֗וֹק <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok, of Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <S%H4812><s%> me-ra-yOt of Meraioth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <S%H285><s%> 'a-chi-Tuv, of Ahitub נְגִ֖ד <S%H5057><s%> ne-Gid [was] the ruler בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem, And their brethren עֹשֵׂ֤י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sei that did הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah the work לַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> lab-Ba-yit, of the house שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh [were] eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim; and two וַ֠עֲדָיָה <S%H5718><s%> Va-'a-da-yah and Adaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֤ם <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פְּלַלְיָה֙ <S%H6421><s%> pe-lal-Yah of Pelaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אַמְצִ֣י <S%H557><s%> 'am-Tzi of Amzi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son זְכַרְיָ֔ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah, of Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <S%H6583><s%> pash-Chur of Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H4441><s%> mal-ki-Yah. of Malchiah

וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav And his brethren רָאשִׁ֣ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim chief לְאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Vot, of the fathers מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim hundred אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim; two וַעֲמַשְׁסַ֧י <S%H6023><s%> va-'a-mash-Sai and Amashai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עֲזַרְאֵ֛ל <S%H5832><s%> 'a-zar-'El of Azareel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אַחְזַ֥י <S%H273><s%> 'ach-Zai of Ahasai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשִׁלֵּמ֖וֹת <S%H4919><s%> me-shil-le-Mot of Meshillemoth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <S%H564><s%> 'im-Mer. of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem And their brethren גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bo-rei mighty men חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil, of valour מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah; and eight וּפָקִ֣יד <S%H6496><s%> u-fa-Kid and their overseer עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, and זַבְדִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H2068><s%> zav-di-'El [was] Zabdiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַגְּדוֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim. of [one of] the great men ס sa-Mek

וּמִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- now from הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim; Also of the Levites שְׁמַעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <S%H2815><s%> chash-Shuv of Hashub בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <S%H5840><s%> 'az-ri-Kam of Azrikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Yah of Hashabiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בּוּנִּֽי׃ <S%H1138><s%> bun-Ni. of Bunni

וְשַׁבְּתַ֨י <S%H7678><s%> ve-shab-be-Tai And Shabbethai וְיוֹזָבָ֜ד <S%H3107><s%> ve-yo-za-Vad and Jozabad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- charge הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah business הַחִֽיצֹנָה֙ <S%H2435><s%> ha-chi-tzo-Nah [had] the oversight of the outward לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God מֵרָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> me-ra-Shei of the chief הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim. of the Levites

וּמַתַּנְיָ֣ה <S%H4983><s%> u-mat-tan-Yah And Mattaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son מִ֠יכָה <S%H4318><s%> Mi-chah Micah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זַבְדִּ֨י <S%H2067><s%> zav-Di of Zabdi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אָסָ֜ף <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf of Asaph רֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh, [was] the principal הַתְּחִלָּה֙ <S%H8462><s%> hat-te-chil-Lah to begin יְהוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> ye-ho-Deh the thanksgiving לַתְּפִלָּ֔ה <S%H8605><s%> lat-te-fil-Lah, in prayer וּבַקְבֻּקְיָ֖ה <S%H1229><s%> u-vak-buk-Yah and Bakbukiah מִשְׁנֶ֣ה <S%H4932><s%> mish-Neh the second מֵאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> me-'e-Chav; among his brethren וְעַבְדָּא֙ <S%H5653><s%> ve-'av-Da and Abda בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שַׁמּ֔וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> sham-Mu-a', of Shammua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גָּלָ֖ל <S%H1559><s%> ga-Lal of Galal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son; יְדִיתוּן ye-di-tun כיְדוּתֽוּן׃ <S%H3038><s%> ye-du-Tun. Jeduthun ק
